attributes.action: Give  free prescriptions to everyone in the u.k.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Free prescriptions  should be available  for everyone  in the u.k.  they are to be introduced in Wales from 1 April
 "The main reason people in the u.k. should have  free prescriptions is  to ensure people  should be able to have the medication they need for there illness
